Detailed Description

Identifies a keypress, that is a key binding.

This class can be used to represent key combinations like: Ctrl+F Alt+Ctrl+Shift+K Shift+C ..... that is, combinations of [ALT, CTRL, SHIFT]+[ASCII character]. An array of wxKeyBind is contained in each wxCmd... see wxCmd for more info.

Note:
This class implements a lot of static utilities which are used by the following classes.

void wxKeyBind::Set (  const wxKeyBind &    key )  [inline]
 

Sets the key binding keycode and flags.

Note:
This function is like DeepCopy but uses a reference instead of a pointer allowing such syntaxes: mybind->Set(wxKeyBind("CTRL+ENTER"));
